body:
Lover.
6th: this is the reason he is not 100% girl. He still has a shred of his former male self. He may have lost his memory, but based on how he cut his hair, it’s clear he isn’t fully a girl. He also is uncomfortable in the change room and he even expresses later that he used to want to be a man. This shows he wasn’t truly a girl yet.
7th: at one point the girl expresses that she liked the boy’s hair longer. Judging by how he had long hair by the end, he either took the advice to heart or got longer hair on his own because at the end he said that he now enjoys being a girl and female, meaning the shred of manliness he had was gone by the end. He had completely become a girl. That was essentially the end of him, as he was now just fully replaced by a girl.

That was the story. I don’t know how you could be confused. It makes no sense because it was pretty simple. Oh ya and if your wondering why I didn’t use terms that are inappropriate, it wasn’t by mistake. It was because of stu

body:
I am seriously annoyed reading the comments. Is everyone stupid from coming so much or something?! The story is so simple! 

First: the girl gives body swap drink and body swaps.
Second: guy still has consciousness and tries to ask for his body back.
Third: girl tricks him into recalling a memory. This is where his downfall began as according to the girl, she can recall both their memories. This means that he can recall only hers as we see him recalling hers. Or it can also mean that he can recall his at the beginning but if he focuses he loses his memories and hers overpower his.
Fourth: girl tells guy that if he has fun times with her he will return body. This is the second trick as this will help her memories take over his mind. Effectively turning him into a 99% girl. 
5th: this is hard to miss but in case you really are absolute morons, the boy, who is now a girl mostly, is taken over as his mind was invaded. He forgot he was a boy so he asks the girl to be his lov
Fourth:
